== Task 3 - Refresh token

In this task you need to exchange a *refresh token* for an access token.

A user has previously logged in to your application using the *authorization code flow of task 2*.

Your application already has several tokens of that user:

  "expires_in": 3600,
  "token_type": "Bearer"
 }

The *access_token* has already expired, you need to obtain a new one.

The HTTP request you have to build is very similar to the one in Task 2.

Consult the authorization server's
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cognito/latest/developerguide/token-endpoint.html[documentation]!

To complete this task, access this resource using the new *access token*:

 https://5ddwj6qy0l.execute-api.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/prod/task3
